case.title: Professional guy seeks professional woman - 39 (London Berkshire)
case.text: Hello there, thanks for reading my post. I am a professional guy who is interested in meeting a professional woman for social occasions, going out, staying in etc. I am a sporty kind of guy who likes to go to the gym and travel. If you are interested in looking for a casual relationship please send your details. pictures and number. Only genuine women please. Thanks
